text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump better than tump's coronavirus narrative. it's in his *ss and is very foul smelling when it dribbles out. anyway coronavirus is way down on his list of priorities. inciting hatred, divisiveness and chaos is the order of every day. quite the sh*tdisturber. and quite full of it.
